entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 27 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Saturday 18 March 2023
